title: Issho ni Kaero.
sinopse:
Konomi Wagata offers an adorable selection of humorous short stories. In the main story a girl promises her crush to take care of a homeless dog. In another adventure a school girl gets little bit exitement in her life - maybe even too much.

1-3. Issho ni Kaero. 4. Wonder Party 5. ZOO-tto! Rival 6. Watashi no Katei Mondai
